main.name: Rick Park

main.bio: Software developer student at Seneca College with strong background in full-stack web development. Various project experience in data communication and network, mobile application development, and RESTful Web APIs.

testimonials.text: Rick is a very smart and creative individual. He always finds a way around challenging problems we encountered during our work together. He is also very punctual and has great communication skills.

Rick is a hard working individual with great work ethics. He is always looking towards learning and mastering new things. Rick is a passionate developer with excellent problem solving skills that has led us to achieve a high score on many projects that we have worked on.
